title: 407. Andy & DJ CTI: Brazilian Election, Declaring Amnesty & Elon Musk's Twitter Acquisition
itunes:title: 407. Andy & DJ CTI: Brazilian Election, Declaring Amnesty & Elon Musk's Twitter Acquisition
description: In today's episode, Andy & DJ discuss Jair Bolsonaro's lack of public appearances & statements since the narrow loss to leftist Lula da Silva, the "Let's Declare a Pandemic Amnesty" article that apologizes for the mishandling of COVID the last few years, and Democrats calling for the Biden administration to open an investigation on Elon Musk's Twitter acquisition.
